title: Add webhook monitoring dashboard
body:
## Feature Request

We should add a monitoring dashboard to track webhook processing statistics and health.

### Requirements
- Display webhook processing metrics
- Show recent webhook deliveries
- Monitor Clide analysis performance
- Alert on webhook failures

### Technical Details
- Could be a simple web interface
- Should integrate with existing FastAPI app
- Maybe use charts/graphs for visualization

### Priority
Medium - Would be helpful for monitoring but not critical

---
*This issue was created to test Clide's real webhook analysis! ðŸš€*
